date.description: Event date in YYYY-MM-DD format. MUST be an absolute date, never a relative expression.

end_time.description: End time in HH:MM 24-hour format (e.g. 15:00). If not mentioned, default to start_time + 1 hour.

title.description: Short event title / description extracted from the user's request.

attendees.description: List of attendee names or emails if mentioned.
